Package com.shashi.service.impl

Class CartServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.shashi.service.impl.CartServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
CartService
public class CartServiceImpl extends Object implements CartService
Implementation of the CartService interface. This class handles all business logic related to the user's shopping cart.

  • Method Details

    • addProductToCart

      public String addProductToCart(String userId, String prodId, int prodQty)
      Adds a product to the user's cart. This method contains complex logic for handling stock and demand. NOTE: This method is currently untestable due to its tight coupling with other service implementations.
      Specified by:
      addProductToCart in interface CartService
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user.
      prodId - The ID of the product to add.
      prodQty - The quantity of the product to add.
      Returns:
      A string indicating the status of the operation.

    • getAllCartItems

      public List<CartBean> getAllCartItems(String userId)
      Retrieves all items in a user's cart.
      Specified by:
      getAllCartItems in interface CartService
      Parameters:
      userId - The user's ID.
      Returns:
      A list of CartBean objects.

    • getCartCount

      public int getCartCount(String userId)
      Gets the total number of items in a user's cart (sum of quantities).
      Specified by:
      getCartCount in interface CartService
      Parameters:
      userId - The user's ID.
      Returns:
      The total number of items.

    • removeProductFromCart

      public String removeProductFromCart(String userId, String prodId)
      Removes one unit of a product from the cart. If the quantity becomes zero, the product is removed entirely.
      Specified by:
      removeProductFromCart in interface CartService
      Parameters:
      userId - The user's ID.
      prodId - The product's ID.
      Returns:
      A string indicating the status of the operation.

    • removeAProduct

      public boolean removeAProduct(String userId, String prodId)
      Removes a product entirely from the cart, regardless of quantity.
      Specified by:
      removeAProduct in interface CartService
      Parameters:
      userId - The user's ID.
      prodId - The product's ID.
      Returns:
      true if the product was removed successfully, false otherwise.

    • updateProductToCart

      public String updateProductToCart(String userId, String prodId, int prodQty)
      Updates the quantity of a product in the cart. Can also be used to add a new product to the cart if it doesn't exist.
      Specified by:
      updateProductToCart in interface CartService
      Parameters:
      userId - The user's ID.
      prodId - The product's ID.
      prodQty - The new quantity.
      Returns:
      A string indicating the status of the operation.

    • getProductCount

      public int getProductCount(String userId, String prodId)
      Gets the quantity of a specific product in a user's cart.
      Parameters:
      userId - The user's ID.
      prodId - The product's ID.
      Returns:
      The quantity of the product, or 0 if not found.

    • getCartItemCount

      public int getCartItemCount(String userId, String itemId)
      Gets the quantity of a specific item in a user's cart. Note: This seems to be functionally identical to getProductCount.
      Specified by:
      getCartItemCount in interface CartService
      Parameters:
      userId - The user's ID.
      itemId - The item's (product's) ID.
      Returns:
      The quantity of the item, or 0 if not found.
